title: Chapter 247: Kuchiyose no Jutsu

Chapter 247: Kuchiyose no Jutsu

Chapter 247: Kuchiyose no Jutsu (Summoning Jutsu)


Ren Tianyou jumped down from the back of Sanbi, then facing towards Sanbi, he said, “Isobu, use large-scale water style technique to attack the entire island. And after I summon other tailed beast, take action according to our original plan.”


“Okay, no problem.” Sanbi answered in its muffled voice. And after Sanbi agreed, Ren Tianyou slowly walked on the surface of water towards Dragon Island.


Seeing Ren Tianyou slowly walking on the water towards them, Dragon Emperor and four princes above the Dragon Island couldn’t help but narrowed their eyes, and prepared themselves to fly out and attack Ren Tianyou. Because at their level, any casual move could cause great damage to the surrounding environment. So if they stayed in the island, then that would be very unfavorable for them, as it was very likely for them to accidently destroy Dragon island.


“Want to fly, who gave you permission?” Seeing dragons wanted to fly, Ren Tianyou sneered. Shortly afterwards, the sea surface in front began to violently roll over and over, as he heard the voice roar of Sanbi Isobi, “Water Style—-Water Flooding Golden Field!” [T.L: ——, don’t know which jutsu it is, if you have any idea, comment below. Thanks]


Along with Sanbi’s voice, from the sea surface in front, suddenly a monstrous wave reaching up to seven or eight meters high suddenly advanced towards Dragon Island.


“Humph, Dragon Domain’s Wall!” Seeing this rolling over and over huge sea wave, the eyes of Camilla flashed with disdain, followed by him waving his right hand, causing a huge dim golden colored energy protective screen to appear in the sky in front of Dragon Island. This protective screen safely stopped that monstrous wave outside the Dragon Island, was not able to intrude even a tiny bit of Dragon Island.


But just at this time, in the sky above this sea wave, Ren Tianyou suddenly appeared. And his hands were quickly making a series of hand seals. “Katon—- Goka Mekkyaku (Fire Style—-Majestic Destroyer Flame!)”


Along with the voice of Ren Tianyou, he spat out wide ranged blazing flame with surging heat wave from his mouth towards everyone underneath him.


“Holy Domain!” Holy radiance rose from the body of third prince Brook, which changed into huge energy barrier in front of everyone, firmly blocking Ren Tianyou’s flame.


“Humph, let’s see how you block this, Enton—-Kagutsuchi! (Inferno Style—-Flame Control!)” Ren Tianyou’s right Sharingan spun rapidly, and huge amount of eye power gushed out, then the blazing flame created by Ren Tianyou’s fire style quickly gathered together and its form changed greatly.


And along with a loud dragon roar sound, nine huge flame dragon came out from inside the gathered flame, then pressed forward with an indomitable will towards underneath Holy Domain set up by Brook.


Enton—-Kagutsuchi (Inferno Style—-Flame Control), after Uchiha Sasuke awakened his Mangekyo Sharingan, this was his right eye’s doujutsu. This jutsu could control morphological change of Amaterasu’s eternal black flame.


When Sasuke was fighting against Raikage, he had controlled flame of Amaterasu to take the form of Amaterasu defense around his body, to counter the speed of Raikage, making Raikage unable to attack him casually.


This Kagutsuchi (Flame Control) was able to control even Amaterasu’s this kind of eternal black flame, so how could it not control ordinary flames. Moreover in Japanese myth, Kagutsuchi in itself was God of Fire, who could control myriads of flame.


These nine flame dragons under the control of Ren Tianyou’s doujutsu Enton—-Kagutsuchi (Inferno Style—-Flame Control), pressed forward with indomitable will momentum and lashed on underneath Holy Domain.


“Hong”, “hong”, “hong”………..extraordinarily large explosion sound unceasingly resounded. Under the assault five flame dragon in quick succession, this originally bright Holy Domain become incomparably dim, as if it would disappear at any time. Then under the assault of additional two flame dragon, this Holy Dragon changed into specks of holy element and dissipated in the air. And the remaining two flame dragons and huge flame created by Ren Tianyou continued to advance towards underneath people.


“Humph, Holy Storm!” Seeing huge flame and flame dragon flying towards them, Dragon Emperor frowned, then with a wave of his right hand, terrifying holy element flew out from his right hand which changed into huge energy vortex flying towards Ren Tianyou’s incoming attacks.


The first to be affected was two huge flame dragon in the front. Without any time to even reflect, they were directly swallowed by this terrifying energy Holy Storm, next the remaining huge flame was also completely swallowed.


“Quite competent.” Seeing his attacks were blocked, without even a hint of fretting, he jumped down from the sky directly towards Dragon Emperor and others.


“Didn’t expect even before we came to you, you actually came here yourself to court death. This just so happens to save our time to find you.” Seeing Ren Tianyou in front of him, Dragon Emperor said to Ren Tianyou in a tone densely filled with killing intent, and was also staring at Ren Tianyou as if he wanted to swallow him up in this instant.


More than 20 dragons had already met their death in the hand of Ren Tianyou, so he and Dragon clan were already mortal enemy. Moreover Ren Tianyou didn’t have any good impression of Dragon clan. All day long they believed they were high above the masses, and were the ruler of this world. Furthermore they were helper of his mortal enemy Ximen clan, so how could Ren Tianyou have any good impression on them.


As for Dragon clan, all of them take a great pride on their existence. But now more than 20 dragons had died in the hand of Ren Tianyou, so with their matchless proud nature, how could they let Ren Tianyou slip by. As a result this fight was already doomed to happen sooner or later, merely Ren Tianyou choose to fight sooner.


“Who will kill who is still unknown, perhaps today could be the day of your Dragon clan’s extinction.” Hearing Dragon Emperor’s those words filled with killing intent, Ren Tianyou smiled in disdain, and then shrugging his shoulder, he indifferently said.


“Roar, you damned bastard, I had already stated I will definitely butcher you before. So now go to hell, Sky Dragon’s explosion!” Just at that time, in the sky directly in front of Ren Tianyou, Camilla appeared and swung his right fist which was covered a dim golden radiance towards Ren Tianyou’s face.


Last time in Magic Domain, Ren Tianyou had actually killed one of the High God realm dragon silently in his presence. So how could he who was usually extremely proud of himself bear this insult? Moreover after returning to Dragon Island, he was severely reprimand by Dragon Emperor too, so if he could he would have already peel off the skin and pull out the tendons of Ren Tianyou. As a matter of fact, when Ren Tianyou suddenly appeared, the very first person that couldn’t bear any longer was him.


“Humph!” Looking at Camilla’s fists covered with dim golden radiances flying toward him, Ren Tianyou coldly snorted, then pulled out Uchiha Round Fan from his back with his right hand, and placed it in front of him.


“Peng!” The fist of Camilla hit Ren Tianyou’s Uchiha Round Fan, “Explode for me.” Yelled Camilla, and his right fist’s dim golden radiance flickered even more violently.


But to his disappointment, this radiance of light not only failed to explode, but was also slowly absorbed by Ren Tianyou’s Uchiha Round Fan.


“This is………?” Seeing the bizarre scene before his eyes, Camilla instantly had ominous foreboding.


The eyes of Ren Tianyou behind the Uchiha Round Fan was flashing with a smile, then he slowly spat out few words, “Uchihagaeshi! (Uchiha Reflection!)”


Along with the words of Ren Tianyou, the Uchiha Round Fan instantly glimmered with dim golden radiance, which directly attacked Camilla who was already too late to defend. The huge explosion had thoroughly hit his body sending him flying.


“Camilla!” Seeing Camilla was sent flying, Dragon Emperor instantly appeared behind Camilla and caught him.


“How are you, is everything alright?” Putting down Camilla, Dragon Emperor asked in concern.


“Many thanks Emperor Father, I am fine, only injured slightly, no big problem.” Camilla wiped the blood from the corner of his mouth, and settling down his violently rolling over and over qi and blood within his body, he slowly replied.


“Be more careful, this guy is tough, don’t be reckless.” Dragon Emperor warned, then looked towards the huge cloud of dust raised due to explosion.


Ren Tianyou slowly walked out, then looking at those Dragon Emperor, Camilla and his brothers, furthermore other hundred or so dragons flying in the sky, Ren Tianyou bit the thumbs of both hand. After blood flowed out from his thumbs, he said, “Looking at your stance, isn’t this wanting to have a group brawl?”


“Then…..” Ren Tianyou’s eyes suddenly glimmered with stern countenance, both hands quickly made a series of hand seals, then placed his both hand on the ground in from of him, causing huge formation to appear, “Let’s see whose helper is biggest.”


“Kuchiyose no Jutsu! (Summoning Jutsu!)”
